title: Vietnam : number of social network users 2017 to 2023
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of users in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 7.
Overall Number of users in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of users in millions is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2021, and finally roughly constant from 2021 to 2023.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Number of users in millions, about 52.8 was reported at Year 2023
Minimum Number of users in millions about 43.8 was reached at Year 2017
